member.name: AUDIO_DUCKING_OPTIONS
member.summary: Specifies audio ducking options. Use values from this enumeration when calling

member.name: AUDIO_DUCKING_OPTIONS.AUDIO_DUCKING_OPTIONS_DEFAULT
member.summary: The associated audio stream should use the default audio ducking behavior.

member.name: AUDIO_DUCKING_OPTIONS.AUDIO_DUCKING_OPTIONS_DO_NOT_DUCK_OTHER_STREAMS
member.summary: The associated audio stream should not cause other streams to be ducked.
